nodes.text: "Smooth" Banjaxx Wab and the Scundereds was a Bith music band. They were employed by Teemo the Hutt and played in his palace's throne room. They were known to play "dirty" Tatooine blues with some virtuoso kloo horn flourishes.
The group leader and kloo horn player, "Smooth" Banjaxx Wab, regularly gave recitals in Jabba Desilijic Tiure's palace, where he also played the role of a spy for Teemo.
